name: Lambert v. California

advocates.advocate_description: argued and reargued for the appellant
reargued the cause, as amicus curiae, in support of the appellant, at the invitation of the Court
argued and reargued the for appellee
Assistant Attorney General of California, reargued the cause for the appellee pursuant to an invitation of the Court

decisions.description: Los Angeles Municipal Code requiring all convicted felons to register with the chief of police held unconstitutional under the Due Process Clause of the Fourteenth Amendment
